categories: Category:Songs by the Max Rebo Band

nodes.text: "Galactic Dance Blast" was a jizz song performed by the Max Rebo Band.
It can first be heard after Leia (Disguised as Boushh) accepts the bounty for Chewbacca. It is later heard as Jabba's Sail Barge makes its way across the Dune Sea to the Sarlacc Pit.

It is notable for never getting an official release due to its master tape being lost after its usage on the documentary From Star Wars to Jedi: The Making of a Saga. Some unfinished versions of the song can be listened to on Youtube. Because the original music is lost, it is not known if these two snippets are from the same song, or if there are two forms of music with the same title.
